consultation_text:
You can always write to me
in any convenient messenger
faq_1_answer: It depends on the format: usually the ceremony lasts about an hour, and the banquet about five. I do not follow strict rules. I always adapt the timing to the mood so the celebration goes naturally and harmoniously.
faq_2_question: What does the price depend on?
faq_2_answer: The cost of my work depends on the duration of the event, location, and format. You can see the approximate cost for 2026 in the services section.
faq_3_answer:
Modern and individual.
Those that fully reflect the essence of the event. I like to work with the screen, prepare unexpected surprises from guests or participants, recall the warmest moments from the hosts' lives, and create new ones. In short, we communicate, dance, sometimes sing, guess, repeat trends, laugh, and live this day so it stays in the heart.
faq_4_answer:
Absolutely - yes!
If you just want to enjoy your celebration, we do everything turnkey. Love to control the process and plan details â€” in consultations I provide all knowledge and tools for comfortable preparation.
